page.title: 17RECREATION 3
page.content: MANY CHILDREN IN THE PART OF ANGUS ARE KEEN ON PONY RIDING.IN BARRY VILLAGE THERE IS A RIDING SCHOOL.IT IS A GOOD PLACE TO LEARN TO RIDE HORSES.I CYCLE TO CONKIES AT THE WEEKEND TAKING MY LUNCH WITH ME. MY PONY IS CALLED RUTH.I GO TO RUTH'S STABLE AND GIVE HER SOME POLOS. I PUT ON HER HEADCOLLAR AND LEADROPE AND LEAD HER FROM HER STABLE AND TIE HER UP.I FIND THE WHEELBARROW,FORK AND BRUSH AND MUCK OUT HER STABLE.I GIVE RUTH SOME HAY AND GROOM HER,THEN I TACK HER UP. FIRST I WARM HER UP BY DOING A TROT TO LOOSEN HER LEGS,WE DO A CANTER THEN WE GO FOR A GALLOP.AFTERWARDS WE GO OVER A JUMP.I THEN UNTACK RUTH AND GROOM HER BEFORE GOING HOME FOR TEA.
